name: PHP CodeSniffer
description: PHPCS linter for Panic's Nova editor.

config.title: Standard
config.description: The coding standard PHPCS should use for linting [PSR1, PSR2, PSR12, PEAR, Zend, Squiz, MySource]. If specifying multiple standards, list them as comma-separated values. You can also specify a workspace-relative or absolute path to a phpcs.xml configuration file. If you do not provide a standard, PHPCS will look for 'phpcs.xml' at the workspace path. If neither is provided, PHPCS will fall back to 'PSR1,PSR2,PSR12'.

config.title: Debugging
config.description: Show debug logs in Extension Console.
